long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now You Can Play Candy Square Right on Your Chrome Browser! 🌟
Enjoy an online gaming experience with Owhit, no internet required!

🍬 Dive into Sweet Fun with the "Candy Square" New Tab Extension! 🎉
Step into a world of colorful puzzles and vibrant squares every time you open a new tab! Introducing our Candy Square New Tab Extension for Google Chrome! 🍭

Immerse Yourself in Square Matching Bliss! 🍬
Get ready to match and clear squares as you embark on a delightful journey through the fun and lively levels of Candy Square. With our extension, each new tab brings you straight into the addictive and entertaining world of square-matching puzzles. Match three or more squares, complete challenging levels, and experience the joy of victory! 🍬

Seamlessly Integrated Features 🚀
Stay connected to your favorite Google services effortlessly with our built-in Google Apps module. From checking your emails and accessing Google Drive to managing your calendar, do it all while enjoying the colorful visuals and engaging gameplay of Candy Square. 📧

Swift and Effortless Navigation 🏃‍♂️
Navigate the web with ease using our intuitive shortcuts feature. Access your most visited websites instantly with shortcut icons conveniently placed on the left side of your new tab. Enhance your browsing experience while staying entertained with square-matching fun. 💻

Security and Reliability 🔒
Rest assured, our extension prioritizes your security. We've meticulously ensured that it does NOT contain any content that could compromise your online safety. Enjoy a secure browsing experience while diving into the delightful world of Candy Square. 🌟

Personalize Your Puzzle Adventure 🎨
Customize your browsing experience by pinning your favorite square-themed backgrounds or seamlessly switching between them. Need to jot down quick notes or strategies for conquering levels? Our extension’s note module is perfect for capturing your thoughts and plans. 📝

Embrace the Fun Challenge 💪
Whether you’re a seasoned fan of puzzle games or new to the excitement, our extension caters to your browsing preferences with its active/passive option from settings. Embrace the challenge and select the mode that suits your love for Candy Square. 🌟

Download Now and Start Matching Squares! 📥
Ready to explore the colorful and vibrant world of Candy Square? Download our extension now and immerse yourself in the fun and addictive gameplay with every new tab you open! It’s time to match squares, complete levels, and enjoy the sweetest puzzle adventure ever! 🍭

Don’t miss out on making your browsing experience truly fun. Download the Candy Square New Tab Extension today and let the puzzle adventure begin! 🎉
